name: streamlit-snowflake
description: Build and deploy Streamlit apps natively in Snowflake. Covers snowflake.yml scaffolding, Snowpark sessions, multi-page structure, Marketplace publishing as Native Apps, and callers rights connections (v1.53.0+). Use when building data apps on Snowflake, deploying SiS, fixing package channel errors, authentication issues, cache key bugs, or path resolution errors.
